basic_information.scholarship_name: Jack and Joan Danner Endowed Scholarship

description: To provide scholarships for Pre-Dentistry students at UCO. Eligibility Requirements Must be an undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Minimum 3.0 GPA Must be a Biology or Chemistry major interested in pursuing a career in Dentistry This scholarship will be available to apply for during the Current Student scholarship period.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Biology   or SIS_Major_2 is Biology-Pre-Dental   or SIS_Major_2 is Chemistry   or SIS_Major is Biology   or SIS_Major is Biology-Pre-Dental   or SIS_Major is Chemistry   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Biology   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Biology-Pre-Dental   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Chemistry   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Biology   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Biology-Pre-Dental   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Chemistry
